entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
